AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Orgnum's royal guard
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was once one of the elite, one of King Orgnum's personal royal guard. Skilled with both blade and magic, and with an affinity towards the sea serpents, [PAWN_nameDef] was a truly frightening sight on the battlefield.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: wereshark hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: There were many vile creatures found on Pyandonea, but none more vile than the wereshark. No one knows why, but [PAWN_nameDef] has dedicated [PAWN_possessive] life to exterminating them, no matter the cost.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: sea serpent hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] made quite a name for [PAWN_objective]self, though not entirely for the right reasons. [PAWN_pronoun] was a hunter, and lived for the feeling of blood washing over [PAWN_objective]. Eventually though, [PAWN_pronoun] grew tired of the regular foes, and sought out something far more dangerous, and somewhat heretical.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] began hunting sea serpents. This obviously didn't go over well with most other Maormer. But [PAWN_pronoun] kept going, slaying every single one [PAWN_pronoun] came across, at least until Orgnum's Dragon Kights put a stop to it.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: crab researcher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc:
One dark and stormy night, [PAWN_nameDef] witnessed something truly unusual. A creature like no other, a bipedal crab, walking on land. The creature approached [PAWN_objective] slowly, and cautiously, all the while making a guttural gurgling sound.

Then, as a bolt of lightning struck, it disappeared, leaving behind a strange pearl like object.

Sadly [PAWN_nameDef] almost immediately lost the pearl, but still likes ponder the wondrous secrets it may have held.
